Class DoubleAttribute

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.irit.smac.model.Attribute
      • com.irit.smac.attributes.DoubleAttribute
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class DoubleAttribute
extends Attribute
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class models a double as an attribute.
    Author:
    Nicolas Verstaevel - nicolas.verstaevel@irit.fr
